title: Can XRP Reclaim $3.84 All-Time High in 2026? Analysts Say These 4 Catalysts Must Align
description: XRP (CRYPTO: XRP) has had quite the journey. Originally designed as an international payment engine, it spent years stuck in legal limbo while Bitcoin and Ethereum ran laps around it. Now that the regulatory dust has settled, XRP finds itself at a crossroads. The token trades around $1.95 as of mid-January 2026, sitting roughly 49% ... Can XRP Reclaim $3.84 All-Time High in 2026?
